I don't know man... Porn in general just isn't hitting different like it used to. Maybe because I have the weakest dick in the game and can't get to a new level with how much I can cum consecutively. Just one and done, you know? Yeah, if I see tits and ass I get hard af but when I finish i'm left with nothing in my head but an "eh. that was alright..." Porn has broken me. I was warned about the effects of porn, but damn it did I not listen. For me, I'm left unsatisfied because I physically cannot reach a higher level of satisfaction, so now I'm trapped in a loop of self-deprecation and wanting more.

Perhaps this is my chance to finally lay off the porn. 5 years of this shit and I'm already burnt out. If I keep going, the only thing that will be left of me is a corpse and my soul burning eternally in hell. See you fellow coomers there.
